channel.title: Website/Forum Creator!
channel.description: Tired of using old dull worn and torn free forum sites? Want vBulletin? Want Smf OR IPB? Well look no further the future of your website can be answered in one simple question do you want this? I can get make elite Sites with Vbull Smf and IPB, Mybb and others im about 50/50 im not to sure if i can say this on here but i can get Free vBull. And make your site the elite of 1337. After all the more that may come will need a place for tutorials,Help,Questions or hang out Im offering this to one person and one peroson only. If you need some of my sites i have made post here and i can give you links. Also, Co.CC Domains are optional.

item.description:
@n33bz0rpl0x wrote:

beastlytom:

nobody is spreading bogus as u can see i have proof.

Wheres your proof from Jelsoft that you can “distribute” their product if they get 50% of the profit. Jelsoft wouldn’t ever give away a license of vBulletin unless it’s a contest or something, a yearly license is very expensive.

item.title: Website/Forum Creator!
item.dc:creator: @beastlytom beastlytom
item.description:
@beastlytom wrote:

r0ckstar96:

Well the guy could be lying anyway. Maybe he meant admin from a site made using vBulletin or something, I don’t know. But I’m sort of suspicious about this. We’ll just have to wait and see I guess.

Im also curious of how this has to do with suspicious your not paying me and im doing it for free. Installing it on a blank domain i don’t understand at all how this is suspicious.[br][br][size=1]Posted on: October 11, 2009, 05:34:10 pm[/size][hr][quote=“r0ckstar96, post:10, topic:307992”][quote author=beastlytom link=topic=404088.msg2991405#msg2991405 date=1255303802]
I can prove for a fact that 5 of my sites have bulletin installed i can log in on each and everyone of them and there not shut down so you can question me but it won’t work when i have the proof will it?
[/quote]
Well, when you have the proof, I might believe you.[/quote]

ok site one of my proof.

www.losthq.co.cc
www.weedscape525.co.cc
hackerz1337.net

and if you want i can install a vbulletin on my hackerz1337.com site. Here is a Smf Site I made also. www.weedscape.co.cc

Don’t Count People So Short Next Time.

Read full topic
